document.docAuthor: Zograf, Julia K., Pavlyuk, Olga N., Trebukhova, Yulia A. & Tu, Nguyen Dinh
document.masterDocTitle: Description of three new Sphaerolaimus species (Nematoda: Sphaerolaimidae) form the South China Sea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Description of three new Sphaerolaimus species (Nematoda: Sphaerolaimidae) form the South China Sea

heading.emphasis:
Identification key to valid species of the genus
Sphaerolaimus

paragraph.keyLead:
5 Gubernaculum with small caudal apophyses..........................................................
S. kleini

12 Gubernaculum with straight dorsal apophyses.......................................................
S. gracilis

- Gubernaculum with L-shaped dorsal apophyses......................................................
S. limosus

13 Tail with numerous hook-shaped setae 25 µm long.................................................
S. uncinatus

14 Body length> 2 mm , gubernaculum long and narrow..............................................
S. makrolasius
- Body length < 2 mm , gubernaculum short, triangular or plate-like............................................. 15

15 Spicules 70 µm or 1.3 corresponding body diameter..............................................
S. occidentalis

- Spicules 15 µm long or 0.8 corresponding body diameter..........................................
S. paragracillis

21 Amphid small, ca 17% of corresponding body diameter..............................................
S. peruanus

22 Amphid ca 30 % of corresponding body diameter..................................................
S. pacificus

- Amphid ≥ 60% of corresponding body diameter..................................................
S. megamphis

27 Tail blunt with irregularly shaped end.........................................................
S. arcospiculum

30 Gubernaculum with two globose apophyses.........................................................
S. ostreae

32 Amphid big,> 40% of corresponding body diameter, spicules short, 1.1 anal body diameters................
S. ganymede
- Amphid small, <30% corresponding body diameter, spicules long, 1.7 anal body diameters....................... S. io

33 Vulva shifted to the posterior half of the body, V = 70-80.............................................
S. profundus

- Vulva near the center of the body, V = 55......................................................
S. haurakiensis
